segments.text: I ’ m sure you never dare to go against your wife .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why should I go against her ? She always seems to have better ideas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever got the goods on her for wrong doings ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Get the goods on her ? She never allows me to go to her office . And she is a good woman . She has been faithful all these years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it ’ s nice to have a husband like you .
segments.speaker: S1
